verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: As controversy rages over the Trump administration 's " zero - tolerance " policy] , [ARG0: immigration lawyers and advocates] [V: report] [ARG1: mass confusion and an absence of protocols to reunite migrant children with the parents from whom they were separated] .
